can my laptop run gmod: We recommend these settings for Garrys Mod: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10; Processor: 2.5GHz or better; Memory: 8 GB; Graphics: 1 GB dedicated VRAM or better; Storage: 10 GB available space
